name: U-Boot
description: U-Boot is a very enjoyable side-scrolling submarine game. Navigate your submarine by tilting your iPhone (or iPod Touch). Use controls on the bottom to shoot torpedoes or to control your speed. Avoid dangerous obstacles (mines, jellyfish, enemy submarines,...). Collect bonuses and power-ups (stars, shields, propellers, torpedoes,...) U-Boot is a lot of fun. Enjoy the game!
